text: Yaqeenan inn mein aisa giroh bhi hai jo kitab parhtay huye apni zaban marorta hai takay tum ussay kitab hi ki ibarat khayal kero halankay kay dar-asal woh kitab mein say nahi aur yeh kehtay bhi hain kay woh Allah Taalaa ki taraf say hai halankay woh dar-asal Allah Taalaa ki taraf say nahi woh to daanista Allah Taalaa ki taraf jhoot boltay hain
